newsitem.title: USA: Baldwin Piano board adopts rights plan.
newsitem.headline: Baldwin Piano board adopts rights plan.

text.p: Baldwin Piano & Organ Co said on Wednesday its board of directors has adopted a shareholder rights plan to assure that shareholders are treated fairly if there is a takeover attempt.
The board set a dividend distribution on September 10, 1996, of one common share purchase right for each outstanding share of Baldwin's common stock, the company said.

The rights have a ten year life, and may be exercised if a party acquires 15 percent or more of Baldwin's common stock, or announces a tender offer to do so, without the consent of the Baldwin's board, the company said.
